FAQ

Questions & Answers.

  • About

    Wicked Templates provides HTML templates using Tailwind CSS. The templates are designed to look adn feel modern

  • Setup

    1.- Install all dependencies.

    npm i

    You sould be good to go.

  • 2 Options

    Ther templates are sold as a free, bundle or individually.

    The bundle will always include all the templates on the project, new updates and of course new versions of this ones.
